heading: Today
text: Snow showers this morning ending. Some sunny breaks west and south.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Brief clearing south, then clouds, with snow showers north.

heading: Thursday, Christmas Day
text: Morning snow showers, mainly northeast. Blustery, turning colder.
temperature: Mid 20s to mid 30s, falling through the day

heading: Friday
temperature: Single digits to lower teens north, mid teens to lower 20s south
